| 16 | 15 | #P_oveq2d | |- ( ( M e. LMod /\ ( x e. ( Base ` ( Scalar ` M ) ) /\ y e. B ) ) -> ( x ( .s ` M ) ( ( _I |` B ) ` y ) ) = ( x ( .s ` M ) y ) ) |
| 17 | 13, 16 | #P_eqtr4d | |- ( ( M e. LMod /\ ( x e. ( Base ` ( Scalar ` M ) ) /\ y e. B ) ) -> ( ( _I |` B ) ` ( x ( .s ` M ) y ) ) = ( x ( .s ` M ) ( ( _I |` B ) ` y ) ) ) |
| 18 | 1, 2, 2, 3, 3, 4, 5, 5, 6, 9, 17 | #P_islmhmd | |- ( M e. LMod -> ( _I |` B ) e. ( M LMHom M ) ) |
